admin/google-drive-import.title: Google Drive Import
admin/google-drive-import.setup.title: Setup
admin/google-drive-import.setup.descript: Please click the button below to grant this app access to your Google Drive.
admin/google-drive-import.connected.text: Your Google account has been connected and the following folders have been created in your Google Drive:
admin/google-drive-import.folder-structu: VTEX Import{lineBreak} |{lineBreak} ---{account}{lineBreak}     |{lineBreak}     ---SKU Images{lineBreak}        |{lineBreak}        ---New   <-- Place files here{lineBreak}        ---Error{lineBreak}        ---Done
admin/google-drive-import.instructions-l: Upload SKU images into the 'New' folder using the following file naming convention:
admin/google-drive-import.instructions-d: The type of ID used to identify the SKU (can be SkuId, SkuRefId, ProductId, ProductRefId)
If this should be the main image for the SKU, include the word 'Main' here
Only add image to skus where Specification matches
admin/google-drive-import.instructions-l: After import, the images will be moved to either the Error or Done folders. For images that encountered an error, the error message will be prepended to the filename.
The app will attempt to automatically import images when they are uploaded to the New folder, but you may also trigger an import manually with the button 'Fetch new images'.
admin/google-drive-import.fetched.text: All new images will be updated shortly
